timeline.bodyText: Interestingly (?) someone asked yesterday if they could have the auto-advance feature in Previewer (for when they were driving and wanted to roll through a set of cards via preview so they got some learning in but didn't mess up their real scheduling. I mention it because it's an interesting idea and also because is it correct to return false here?
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText:
Commands are currently only used for gestures so it won't affect the aforementioned functionality.
It won't be correct in future to return false. But I'll be extending and fixing this in the follow-up and would prefer to keep this PR non-functional.
replies.author: david-allison-1
